casebody.data:
LINEBERGER
v.
NCDOC, et al. No. 141P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 4, 2008. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Lineberger.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 657 S.E.2d 673.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of April 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of April 2008."
